snippet: Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz  appeared on television to call for calm on Sunday, hours after being shot by soldiers in what he said was an accident.
abstract: Mauritania's Pres Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz is wounded in what officials say is an accidental shooting by a nervous soldier; some remain suspicious of incident, which occurs against  backdrop of chronic political instability in the country.
lead_paragraph: Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz  appeared on television to call for calm on Sunday, hours after being shot by soldiers in what he said was an accident.

headline.seo: Mauritania Says President Was Shot Accidentally by Soldier
headline.main: Mauritania Says Soldier Shot Leader by Accident
headline.print_headline: Mauritania Says Soldier Shot Leader By Accident
